title: Banned in champion select
body: Sometimes when i join champion select and write my role/lane i get banned for a few seconds so someone else can take my lane. Why does i get banned??

replies.body:
What he means is muted, or being unable to type and send messages in champ select, it's happened to me before and to friends I have played with.

I noticed it typically happens when people type all at once. It blocks people from writing for some seconds.

I really believe it's just something put in place to stop spam, but it targets the wrong people or everyone, who knows.
What this guy said. I have it happen during champ select and post-game chat every now and then, more-so during post-game chat.
What do you mean banned? There's a thing called pick order in things like Draft Pick where you have to wait your turn before selecting a champion.
Sorry...  but I legitimately cannot understand what you're trying to say.
